areas.name: IMT Kharkhoda
areas.description: IMT Kharkhoda is a rapidly developing Industrial Model Township in Haryana, strategically located just 40 km from Delhi. This government-planned industrial hub offers excellent connectivity via NH-44 and KMP Expressway.

areas.name: Bahadurgarh
areas.description: Bahadurgarh is a rapidly growing industrial city in Haryana, located just 25 km from Delhi. Known as the 'Gateway to Haryana', it offers excellent connectivity through metro, highways, and railways.

areas.name: Sonipat
areas.description: Sonipat is a major district headquarters and educational hub in Haryana, located 45 km from Delhi on NH-44. Known for its DDJAY plots, industrial estates, educational institutions, and agricultural land.

areas.name: Rohtak
areas.description: Rohtak is a rapidly developing district headquarters in Haryana, located 70 km from Delhi via NH-9. Known for IIM Rohtak, PGIMS Hospital, and strong real estate market with 13% YoY growth in 2024-25.
